end else if (up_tlf_s_ready == 1'b1) begin
    response_ready <= 1'b1;
  end
end

always @(posedge clk)
begin
  if (response_valid == 1'b1 && response_ready == 1'b1) begin
    up_tlf_s_valid <= up_bl_partial;
    up_clear_tl <= response_eot;
  end else if (up_tlf_s_ready == 1'b1) begin
    up_tlf_s_valid <= 1'b0;
  end
end
